content.detailedDescription: View object above trees. object was not a shape i could identify. the object was reflective and flat color in some areas. something red near the bottom part of the object. changed direction crossed the road. the object was moving south west along tree line which ran parallel to route 2, which i was driving northbound. seeing it was going to cross road. i turned around now going south now and pulled over on side of road and took picture with cell phone.
content.summary: View object above trees. object was not a shape i could identify. changed direction crossed the road.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home, wife with me noticed it, showed my sister when we got to her house, we checked on it once in awhile, & it had moved.Very strange when i saw second one appear & disappear. i just google hattiesburg ufo & there's a video just like it from youtube,(3 years ago) fireball ufo hattiesburg. i have a little video
of what we saw from my cell phone.
content.summary: Bright lite, in blue sky, then i saw a second one near it & then the second one disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was contacted by my brother on 1/24/15 @ 7:19 p.M ,he told me to go outside & look at some strange lights in the sky.He was only a few miles from my house when i received his call. i quickly grabbed  my 20x80 binoculars & looked to the west & spotted 6 to 8 lights ascending from the horizon.Being a amateur astronomer i spend many hours viewing the night sky and familiar with planets & stars and their location. when viewed through my binoculars these objects appeared to be amber to orange in color.  as they moved closer they spread apart , no sound was heard & it was a clear cold night! one by one they disappeared as if the lights were turned off. several months ago i was contacted by a friend that had witnessed the same thing near my location!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing amber orbs spotted in n lakeland fl

content.detailedDescription: I was on the cross channel ferry leaving calais enroute to dover. as we left port i went to the stern of the ship to view the calais skyline. the sky was overcast, there was no moon and the wind had dropped. as we got a bit further out i took out my smartphone to take some photos. i stood on a bench so that i could take the photos over the glass fencing. i took four frames from right to left to capture the view. without checking i put away my phone and went inside to get a drink. after sitting down with my coffee i checked what i had photographed. in the first and second frame i thought it was light reflexion, but then in the third and fourth frames there were two glowing objects, seemingly moving from right to left. i went back outside to check the sky, but nothing could be seen. i then took another two photos of the same area and there was no reflexion. prior to taking the first four photos i was taking in the scene of calais being lit up and did not view anything unusual with the naked eye.It seems the camera picked something up.? my feelings during the event went from neutral to curious to `what is that´.I am ex-military and a pilot.
content.summary: Enroute from calais to dover, two glowing objects photographed with smartphone.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside flying my quadcopter so i was looking up and saw a large group of objects that appeared very strange. i watched for a minute or so and when i could clearly see them changing directions i ran to grab my cell phone. i zoomed in with my cell phone as much as possible and recorded them until they were gone. they were very shiny objects all moving in a similar direction but constantly changing direction around each other even backwards, almost like they were dancing or playing. when the sun would reflect off of them they shined almost like stars in the sky which aided in their directional changes to be seen. there was no sound whatsoever. i know for a fact that aircraft can not move like these objects and they definitely were not balloons, balloons can't go backwards large distances or backwards at all. i assume they were around cloud height in the sky and were moving at a fast speed. i took some stills from the video as well.
content.summary: Saw a large group of objects in the sky that seemed to be playing

content.detailedDescription:
As my wife was backing up onto the street beside our house i was standing to my right side of the car with our dog which was on a leash; facing north and looking at the sky to the right of the mesa that towers over the houses on our street. we are the third house down from the mesa and the reason for my including this is that i had clear view of the open sky, no clouds or chemical trails, to the right of and above (the craft was approximately 1k above and too the right of the mesa) the mesa. upon the craft appearing i yelled for my wife to stop and look; but, for some reason she could not get the car stopped so she only saw the tail end of the sighting of the craft that was a beautiful blue-green either glowing or reflecting the morning sun with a trailing tail, of what looked like a light gray mist, that was about 4-5 times the length of the craft. the trail never varied and the craft never descended or ascended but flew straight towards the ne.
i never felt any thing, had any reaction other than my observing the beautiful light that changed while it flew and for some reason that felt anticlimactic i just stopped watching it and didn't film it with my cell phone.
content.summary: Suddenly was there, hovered a second or two then took off ne direction at approximately 35-50 miles per hour

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened to the cousin of a friend in the town of mantagua, chile. he lives alone with his pitbull dog, in a house that is on a very large lot, the house is in the center of the property. according to what he himself told me, is that that day was like any other. night came and decided to cook dinner after a began to hear a strange noise coming from outside the house while i approached the window and get to see the beings who were watching him then i saw that your dog will not wake up after it decided to pull out your phone and record in the direction of the window, then terrorized the end of the video, runs to hide under his bed where his shotgun with which you feel safer, out from under the bed wing routed door that faces the outside where you will search for bodies to shoot, according to the saw them run away.
  after this tremendous experience we control the video right through whatsap to 3 friends in total and begged us to not show anyone because they were going to try to fool.
   i breaking the promise they sent this video to analize it and i would love to give me your opinion, thank you very much.
content.summary: 3 alien faces appeared at the window, hypnotize a pitbull and generate a very strange noise

content.detailedDescription: White light straight line west to north west big flash then it was gone
content.summary: White straight line flash gone

content.detailedDescription: It was an orange light ball that came from the west and went n/e then vanished. no clouds in the sky.
content.summary: It was an orange light ball that came from the west and went n/e the vanished. no clouds in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We noticed the lights when we pulled into the back of our neighborhood. we wanted a better look so we drove by the gas station and looked across the hwy. the lights hovered for a while. they went up then down. they were different colors. we watched an airplane turn abruptly to avoid the area. then shortly after that we observed another plane. this one was odd. it had different nav. lights and when it got closer, a red light came on. it followed two of the lights to the south. the other lights got very low and disappeared. one returned and hovered for a good while and it also went below the tree line. we also observed way up in the sky a star moving southeast at a constant speed. it went straight across orion's belt. it was strange all of this happened at the same time. i need to add to the fact we are
near a big airport. i know the air traffic and this was not normal. my buddy has the video on his phone.
content.summary: 6 lights grouped together at a low altitude glowing different florissant colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking continuous shots in the water show at bellagio hotel las vegas. nv. everything went very fast.
content.summary: The object moved very fast

content.detailedDescription: I saw four bright orbs traveling southwest direction. i was looking at the chemtrails the morning of 1/20/15. i was at work, midtown memphis and i was looking to the sky (westward) and spotted what i first thought were birds flying. i got excited when i determined that they were not birds, but instead orbs flying. two orbs were flying ahead of the other two. the second two orbs were afew feet behind the first orbs but to the right abit. all four orbs were flying  straight, no sound from them at all. i lost sight of them because they were too far away. i kept saying to myself get your phone out and snap a picture but i didn't want to lose site of them so i didn't bother reaching for my phone. i tried to get a coworker to witness but he was too late to see anything, since it only lasted afew seconds.
content.summary: Four flying objects to the southwest over memphis tn.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping in my friend's backyard on his trampoline with three other people, and at about 1 am est, i spotted a moving, star-sized, object. being the smartest and most observant one of the group, i called the other three to look at what i told them was the iss, but about 15 minutes later it stopped in its track. i was making sure i wasn't going crazy, so i asked my friend what he just saw, and sure enough, he said that he saw it stop too, but this is where it gets interesting. i asked my friend to point at what he was looking at, and it turned out that we were watching two completely different objects. 15 minutes after that, they started moving towards each other and stopped when they reached a certain point. at this point, my object emitted a red light that pulsed throughout the sky and my friend's object disappeared. in about another hour, my object was gone too. for the rest of the night my friends and i could feel things watching us, but we didn't look for evidence.
content.summary: There were multiple crafts semmingly fighting or exchanging something

content.detailedDescription:
I just witnessed tonight 1/24/15 something strange on daubenberger road in turlock @ 7 pm while driving home. it is foggy tonight, but saw three white lights in a backwards triangle (possibly a boomerang shape- difficult to see in the fog/haze layer) about 100-200 feet above my truck moving slowly at first, then speeding up quickly disappearing into the fog. the object was heading northbound over houses going towards the cornfield north of tuolumne road. no sound. my wife was riding in the passenger seat, but was looking down at her phone when i pointed it out. she did not see it before it disappeared into the fog/haze bank.

i am a retired police officer and veteran usaf aircraft crew chief and veteran army intelligence. it did not appear to look like any aircraft i am familiar with. it was very strange. 

last year, my son and i saw some red orb lights in the sky near here as well. did not report them though as i wasn't sure if they were paper lanterns. this object though was obviously a fast moving machine. -mvb
content.summary: Turlock ca - triangle lights craft flew fast over my truck and disappeared in fog

content.detailedDescription: My mom and my friends were coming back from san francisco zoo when we spotted a bright object in the sky we observe the object for a good 3 minuites and then we felt like what we saw wasn't a helicopter or air plane we knew that it was a ufo.We first saw it go straight west and then just went over a hill and out of sight.There were maybe 6 lights rapidly flashing .Taryn felt scared and at first thought it was an airplane. one of my friends was weirded out and exited at the same time and the other thought it was an airplane as well. i new it was a ufo when i first saw it . i was very scared and thrilled. the object disapeared over the hill at 7:09 pm. we were on the diablo.
content.summary: Different fright bright and defenetly paranormal

content.detailedDescription: I was lookimg the volcano popocatepelt that it was having little flame on the top and them some lights apeer and glow in a row, them they make shapes like a circle and a trangle but them they disapeare and like 30 minutes later they apear in other place and do the same thing like other houre.
content.summary: Lights moving around the volcano popocatepelt

content.detailedDescription: Me and my partner were working about the time he noticed something and asked me to look so, as i look up i see two bright objects or lights real close to each other and my partner said that it looked like to circles side by side so as we watched more it speed up, turned and slowed down unusual moments in the air that aircrafts can't make. so i take some pictures as another on comer comes along to see and he was baffled as to what the flying object was so as i start running to the front of my work place to get a better photo it vanished me and my partner were sure what we saw thought it was neat and incredible as we have never seen nothing like it . overall i would say that it has changed my thought about a lot of things and to what is actually out there in the world today well that's my story i have a photo i will post and would definetly like to know opinions as to what y'all might think it is thanks .
content.summary: Really strange never seen anything like 2 white objects look connected very odd .

content.detailedDescription:
I actually began noticing "things" in the weeks before christmas 2014.  i was at my bathroom window in the dusk of the evening when i saw something fly over my home that appeared to have a bar of light under it.  i didn't have my glasses on at the time, but rushed to grab them, then went outside to see the object as i hoped it would complete its flight over my home to the other side.  i noticed there were other craft flying about which seemed might have been military as they were fairly low and had flashing lights.  the object i was hoping to see apparently made an "about face" back over my home in the same direction from which it came and when i raced back through my home to see it from the original side...It had simply disappeared.  i will add that i heard no noise from this craft whatsoever!  at this point, being very curious, i went back out my front door and my eyes were immediately drawn to a very small light that appeared to be a star and seemingly "hovering" in the tree branches.  at first, i thought what i was seeing was a star and that i was simply "swaying" myself slightly so as to make the "star" appear as if it were "moving through the branches", however it's motions were not indicative of something like this at all!  i leaned up against my home and rested my head on it to be sure i wasn't moving and witnessed this little light move up the side of the tree's trunk, sometimes moving behind the tree and back out again.  it would move through the branches and i kept losing sight of it, then it would reappear.  knowing now that it wasn't my imagination, i moved away from the tree to find it appeared to be high up in the sky and just "hovering", but it would slowly move from side to side, then up and down, crossways and, at times, appeared to be "bouncing and spiraling" to a slight degree!  as i began to look at some of the other "stars" in the area...I found that as i focused on them, they would move in this very same fashion!!!  also, at this point, i realized that the ones that would move like this...Weren't "twinkling" as stars do, but that they were actually "flashing"!!!  also, i tested this on other stars to make sure that it wasn't an illusion of the eyes i was seeing to find that some of the stars did not move at all...As the others did!  i figured if i was "seeing things" that as i focused hard enough on any of them...They would all react the same way!  but this was not the case to any degree!

almost every cloudless night since this, i've been able to see a number of them high in the sky just "hovering" in the same general areas.  i suppose for those that aren't aware, they are simply the "stars" of the universe, but i believe that's how they're meant to appear unless you are one who is curious and aware enough to know that "they" are out there and you have the desire to know more!  i believe for those of us in this category, our galactic families want to reveal themselves to us!

on new year's eve, i noticed 2 hovering very much lower in the skies to the west of my home and about 10 feet above the some of the neighborhood homes.  also, i saw a light that appeared to be reflecting off the windows of one of the homes much closer to ground level and was the bright orangish color of the local street lamps, yet it was moving in that same "hovering" motion as the one over the tops of the homes.  i was distracted away from this momentarily and when i returned, the one over the houses was gone, but the other street lamp colored one remained, but was now away from the home and into the woodsy area beside the home.  since seeing this light, i've noticed many more of these and other colored lights where "street lights" weren't before.  there's also others that are simply a bright white like the typical color of a porch light and some that are the bluish tint of the new led  style lights or even a greenish hue that is also the color of street lamps.  they appear to take on the colors of real lights in the surrounding so as to mask themselves better.  they also seem to remain hidden in the depths of the surrounding wooded areas and don't "come out" or show themselves unless they are observed!  now that i know they are "out there" i'm able to find more and more all the time and witness more activity from them!  tonight, saturday...January 24th, one of the "stars" appears high in the sky over south horizon, i watched of the lighted orbs seem to fall to the ground, although there was nothing visible on the ground afterward, one that was clearly "out in the open" yesterday is hidden in the protection of the woods, barely visible!  many of the other ones i see regularly remain in their "normal" areas!  everyday brings witness to a new experience in one form or another!  this is absolutely amazing!!!  :-d
content.summary: There appears to be these glowing and hovering orbs or lights throughout the area in which i live.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in a town of zrenjanin, serbia when i looked up at the sky. it was dusk but clear. i saw an orange ball of light hovering. then, slowly, it started to move west. it did not blink, and it moved too slow to be plane. i observed it for ten minutes until it became too far to see by eyes only. i felt as if i knew it was not from this world.
content.summary: Ball of orange moving slowly in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed my iphone was stuck in a horizontal position and i had turn on the portrait orientation lock to readjust it.  i had a strange feeling and for some reason decided to look outside my window, which is when i saw the first silver orb in the sky, which i saw at 45 degree angle on the horizon, at 1:15am.  i was intent on watching it, because i wanted to figure out what it was.  it was far brighter than any star in the sky and it was a partly-cloudy night.  sometimes i would think that it was actually just a star, because of how perfectly still it would hover; then it would make a swift, small movement in one direction and hover still again.  i watched this orb for 45 minutes until i noticed a second orb, almost directly above my property, about 5 degrees on the horizon.  that is when i grabbed my camera and started filming the second closer object.  my camera is facing out of my window, all the lights in my room are off, so there is no glare.  the camera is on a tripod, so i dont move the camera at all after i focus and zoom in all the way; though i do bump the tripod at 3:58.  at 3am i stopped filming and decided to go to bed.  when stopped observing the objects, the second object was in about the same spot and the first object was farther away, about 55 degrees on the horizon.
content.summary: Two silver orbs hovering over doylestown, pa

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting fire wood on back porch when i heard a jet flying very low about  2000 ft. under the left wing was a red light / black triangle flying under the military jet i run to get my binoculars and saw the object clear. can hear the jet but not the other object had no sound. you could see it when the lights on the wings of the jet flashed { white lights }  showing the black triangle with the red light in the center of it. it  was go north towards waco texas   i hope i saw my first ufo i can't stop thing about it. it was awesome. please check this out if you can and get back with me if you find out something about it. hope someone else saw it too.
thank you.
[name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Jet was flying low about 500 to1000ft.Over my houes and i saw something with a red light under left bottom side of wing haeding north toward wacog a red light under

content.detailedDescription:
On the 6th of december 2014 me and my girlfriend where on holiday in new york we visited at the moment of the observation the empire state building..
we walked around on the observation deck of the empire state building to enjoy the views. and then i saw it! a black disk shaped ufo was hovering there in the distance just underneath the clouds. off course i asked my girlfriend if she also sees it! and she confirmed that! it was defenitly no helicopter i could see that!! it had totally no helicopter shape..

after several minutes of hovering it suddenly dissapeared in the clouds.
content.summary: Hovering above manhattan and disappeared  suddenly in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard having a smoke. i looked to the south east and i saw what looked like a high flying jet leaving a vapor trail about 35 degrees altitude, 150deg. southeast.Measured by my iphone. i got my binoculars and followed it and it looked like a circle with delta shape behind it.It was slowly moving down to the horizon. it left no trail,but retained it's shape the whole time. it changed color from yellow to bright orange about 25 deg. from horizon. it moved slowly. i do not think it was in our atmosphere as it left no trail. it looked to me as if it were in earth orbit.If that is the case, then it was very large.I thought it may have been a rocket launch from vandenberg afb, but i have seen those before and it was not that.This looked like a shape i reported two years ago, but this one was much farther away and larger and different color.I did not have time to get a picture and i think it would not have come out anyway. this was close to the sun. the object was 35deg above the horizon and the sun was close to it ,but the object was going away from the sun. it disappeared from view and i came in to report right away. i can send a drawing.
content.summary: Observed delta shape , bright yellow turning to orange in se sky.

content.detailedDescription: On wednesday the 21, of january 2015, there were beautiful clouds in the sky. while i was driving i saw what to me looked like the sun being visible with out glare through the clouds. i tried to take pictures when i was stopped at traffic lights. none of those captured what i initially saw.  when i got home i took the first two picture standing outside of my front door. i felt very strongly that i should do that before i came in. then about 10 minutes later i felt very inclined to go outside and look once again to see if i could capture the sun piercing through the clouds. i never saw the blue green orb with my eyes. i just noticed it in the pictures yesterday. the third picture that was taken ten minutes after the first two a hint of the orb is visible.
content.summary: I felt an inclination to take some pictures of the clouds then yesterday i saw the blue green orb when i was reviewing them.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i had camped on the eastern side of the bruce peninsula on the western shore of georgian bay a few miles north of cape chin. in the evening at around 7 p.M. we looked to the south east and observed an extremely bright light moving over the water at a moderate altitude of perhaps a few thousand feet. the light moved at a very high speed and then immediately stopped. it changed direction and accelerated at a tremendous rate stopping abruptly again. it repeated this pattern a number of times. in one of it's manoeuvres it appeared to be coming toward us. i admit that i was a little frightened as i had heard of alien abductions. we watched the object for perhaps ten minutes. i don't recall exactly how we lost sight of it. there were many reported sightings of this object that evening. most were on the south eastern side of georgian bay where there are thousands of summer cottages as well as a number of towns.

my friend, a lawyer, and i felt this was not an aircraft of any kind as it moved so quickly and erratically. i possess a commercial helicopter license and owned a hughes 300 helicopter and i have a bell jetranger endorsement. i know how helicopters perform and there is no way a helicopter could do the manoeuvres we observed with such tremendous acceleration and abruptness in stopping.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright light observed over southern georgian bay, ontario

content.detailedDescription: I regulary check camnet haze web cams and sometime ufo or objects are on pics :this was happens yesterday enening : boston (blue hills) camnet 2015 jan 23th between 20h45 to 21h45 : 1 to 3 ufo's hovering near to the ground.
content.summary: Boston camnet 2015 jan 23th between 20h45 to 21h45 : 1 to 3 ufo's hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on interstate 5 headed north between highway 33 and bates road i believe. there were no other cars around at the time and i had not seen any other aircraft before there was suddenly a large shadow passing over my car coming from the south west direction headed north east. that is what made me notice the object was the size of the shadow covering my car and how suddenly it appeared. just as it was done passing over the top of my car i saw that the shadow looked like a large boomerang (if i had to compare it to a craft i know i would say it was almost like a stealth bomber) but it was hard to tell because i had to stoop down and crane my neck up to try and get a look. about then was when the bright blueish white light covered my car and blinded me slightly. i then had to try to focus again on the road but the light and aircraft stayed with me for about a mile i would say before the light stopped and the shadow passed back over my car heading back the way it had come from. i continued on my way to work but i still felt very disoriented and had a hard time focusing in general. my head felt pretty foggy afterwards like i had just woken up and my vision was hazy, like i was looking through a white lens and it was tinting my vision. within ten minute my vision was pretty normal but i still felt out of sorts and slightly agitated. at the time i was about ten minutes or so from my destination but i arrived ten minutes after when i should have and i had a strong headache throughout the night while at work.
content.summary: Large flying shadow approached then cast blueish white light.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was working at a job laying sod and we had been picking up pallets of sod from this place in edmonton for two weeks. on this one day my boss sends me and a couple other guys on a run to pick up some sod. when we arrived we discovered black suburban sand black helicopters flying around behind the place that sold the sod  so i asked the employee what was goin on and he said that they had found crop circles in the field ,he also said we could go look if we wanted. as we walked into the field i was very nervous the scene was out of x files very weird as we approached people were taking measurements and doing tests of some kind. so you know i'm not bull shitting you just search edmonton crop circles . these  "scientists " told me that there has never been anything like this found in north america so read about it because this is just the beginning.  so  about a few days go buy and my friends and i are out at about 12 am and happen to be driving down the road that i had seen the crop circles and as i looked out the window i saw. strange lights exactly over the spot wher inhad seen the crop circles.  i then made my friend pull over the car imideiatly we then proceeded to stand right under this object that appeared to be massive in size shaped like a triangle with odd white lights  for about 2 min and then it vanished in a link of an eye . the two friends i was with don't talk about what happened . everyone i know thinks i'm cray .  fast forward 8 years i'm with some other. friends driving down the same road same time of year all of a sudden all the hair stands up on my neck i look out the window and what do i see the same ufo in the same place omg i'm losing it .  there's no way in the same place wtf. that's weird right. honestly there's more to the story but i'm nervous about the info . seems to me like a lot of things happening at one spot and i've witnessed it 4 times alone someone should look into it deeper. would love to tell all my info just a bit nervous
content.summary: Found crop circles same week witnessed event at same location and twice more since then

content.detailedDescription: I live in moreno valley ca. my home is in the foothills just north of march afb. on or around dec 4 2014 i was sitting in my family room watching tv when  i noticed what i thought was an airplane flying towards my house. i live appx 2000 feet up on the hillside and i have a excellent view of the city of riverside. iv'e lived in this area for 40 years and am used to seeing all kinds of aircraft from air refuelers flying out of march to commercial flights from ont and lax. yes my view is that good on winter nights. anyway i was looking at the planes flying this particular night and noticed one flying straight towards my house. no big deal so i glanced at it and then watched some more tv. after a couple of minutes i looked at the object again and thought by now it should have already flown over. i dismissed it and kept watching tv. another minute goes by and i look again and it's still coming at me and it's flying so low, about 4000 ft. so i get up and walk out back to get abetter look.It was a big object as it approached. there were two rows of 4 or 5 white bright lights on it's underside. as it got even closer i thought how come i don't here any noise. i live in a canyon and believe me when a refueler is that close it shakes my house. at this point i was totally baffled. at first i reasoned it was a blimp, but it was the fastest blimp i ever saw. too slow for a jet to stay airborn. then about 3/4 of a mile it banked left and flew north over box springs mtn. and when it banked i relized blimps don't bank. the object was triangular and very large an made absolutely silent. as large as a c5 galaxy, even larger. weird!! i don,t know if this has anything to do with it but the next couple of days i noticed civilian passenger planes flying out of march. the jets were all white with a blue stripe running dowd the length of it and no other markings.
content.summary: Large silent delta winged object

content.detailedDescription:
1. group sitting in front yard.
2. others called out 3 "stars" revolving in sky.
3. airplane - then ufo.
4. three items revolving...Slowly moving in circle ....Overhead ..After 30 mins, 
all three streak to west at high rate of speed - faster than any aircraft.
5. my father (lockeed-burbank employee) called the tower - no aircraft
flying near our location at that time...Not on radar .....
everybody screaming/yelling & running aaway ....
6. objects sped off to west horizon together - out of sight less than a minute..

at high altitude. too fast for balloon .... much faster than any aircraft ...
no satillites or rockets at this time (1951)
content.summary: Lights in sky hovering...Then fast westward exit to horizon
